title.en: A Prayer to the Glorious Protector Guru

text.en: Embodiment of all the qualities of knowledge, power and love
text.en-trans: jampal yang sok rik sum gyal kün gyi

text.en: Of Mañjughoṣa and all the other conquerors of the three families,
text.en-trans: khyen tsé nü pé chö kündüpé zuk

text.en: Essence of radiant light from the Lake-Born Vajra’s heart,
text.en-trans: tsokyé dorjé tuk kyi özer chü

text.en: With boundless intelligence and confidence—to you I pray.
text.en-trans: lodrö pob tayé la solwa deb

text.en: In the basic space of the inexhaustible secrets of all the bliss-gone buddhas,
text.en-trans: deshek kün gyi sangwa mizé ying

text.en: Including Mañjughoṣa and the eight great glorious sādhana deities,
text.en-trans: jampal yang sok palchen drubdé gyé

text.en: You are the all-pervasive lord, the source of all causal and resultant phenomena,
text.en-trans: kün gyi khyabdak gyundré chö kün gyi

text.en: Master of wondrous intelligence—to you I pray.
Your gentle form embodies the wisdom all the victorious ones with their marks and signs,
text.en-trans: jam nyen tsenpé gyal kün yeshe ku

text.en: Your melodious voice proclaims the Dharma, vast and profound, which frees all beings,
text.en-trans: zabgyé yang nyen chö kyi dro kün drol

text.en: Heruka, whose wise and loving intelligence knows no bounds,
Forefather of the ḍākinīs of the three abodes—to you I pray.
text.en-trans: né sum khandrö mepor solwa deb

text.en: Through the wondrous truth of the Three Root deities,
text.en-trans: tsa sum lha yi denpa mejung gi

text.en: May the glorious guru’s deathless wisdom form
Remain forever in the lotus of my heart
text.en-trans: nying gi pemor takten zhukpa dang

text.en: And guide me throughout all my lives to come!
text.en-trans: tserab küntu jesu dzin gyur chik
